name: fail
chn: vi. & vt. 失败, 未能 (做到), 不及格
example_en: Despite his hard work, he failed the exam.
example_cn: 尽管他努力学习，他还是考试不及格。
memory_tips: 词源：来自拉丁语 'fallere'，意为'欺骗'或'失败'。联想记忆：想象一个人试图跳过一条沟渠但未能成功，象征着失败。图像记忆：可以想象一个学生在考试中低头看着不及格的成绩单。

image_prompt.main_image: A student sitting at a desk, looking disappointed with a red 'F' grade on a paper in front of them.
image_prompt.example_image: A classroom scene where a teacher is handing back exams, and one student looks particularly upset, holding their exam paper with a failing grade.

collocations: fail to do (未能做); fail the test (考试不及格); fail to deliver (未能交付)
